original: intros A T r f x n m Tx def_ok_f incr_f rx_fx bounded_sas_chain m_le_n. split. - apply iteres_increasing_chain; auto. - intro H_dist. apply chain_incr in iteres_increasing_chain; auto. assert (non_dist_chain A (iteres A f x n)). { apply dist_chain_ind with (p := iteres A f x n). + apply iteres_dom_ok in def_ok_f; auto. + apply pre_domok_incr_chain in chain_incr; split; auto. } destruct non_dist_chain as [p [S_p_n power_eq]]. assert (S p <= n) by lia. contradiction.
